name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.firstDose
title: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.firstDose
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The first dose (dose quantity) administered in humans can be specified, for a product under investigation, using a numerical value and its unit of measurement
element.definition: The first dose (dose quantity) administered in humans can be specified, for a product under investigation, using a numerical value and its unit of measurement.
